need_help.title: Can't find what you're looking for?
need_help.description: Our customer service team is ready to assist you

general.a1: Manfaz is a comprehensive delivery platform connecting stores with users, providing fast and reliable delivery services for all your needs.
general.a2: You can use Manfaz through our website or mobile app. Simply create an account, select a store, add products to your cart, and complete your order.
general.q3: In which areas is Manfaz available?
general.a3: We offer our services in several major cities in Saudi Arabia and are working on expanding to new areas.
general.a4: We operate 24/7, but store hours may vary.
general.a5: Yes, you can track your order in real-time through the app or website.

orders.q1: How can I place an order?
orders.a1: Select the store you want to order from, add products to your cart, review your order, choose a payment method, and confirm your order.
orders.a2: You can cancel your order before the store starts preparing it. Once preparation begins, cancellation is not possible.
orders.q3: What if there is an issue with my order?
orders.a3: You can contact customer service directly through the app or website, and we will help resolve any issue.
orders.q4: Can I modify my order after confirmation?
orders.a4: Orders cannot be modified after confirmation. If you need to make changes, please cancel the order and place a new one.
orders.q5: How can I check my order status?
orders.a5: You can check your order status in the 'My Orders' section of the app or website.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.content: We strive to provide fast and reliable delivery services for all your requests.

process.title: Delivery Process
process.content: Your request is tracked in real-time from the moment of confirmation until delivery.

timing.title: Delivery Timing
timing.content: We strive to deliver your request on time, considering unforeseen circumstances.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.content: We are responsible for delivering your request in good condition and on time.

delivery.a1: Delivery time depends on your location and the store. Typically, it takes between 30 to 45 minutes.
delivery.a2: Delivery fees vary based on the distance between your location and the store. You can check the delivery fee before confirming your order.
delivery.q3: Can I track the delivery agent?
delivery.a3: Yes, once the agent accepts your order, you can track their location in real time on the map in the app.
delivery.q4: What if the delivery agent can't find my address?
delivery.a4: The agent will call you if they have trouble finding your location. Please ensure you provide accurate details and landmarks in your address.
delivery.q5: Can I schedule a delivery time?
delivery.a5: Currently, we only offer instant delivery. We are working on adding a scheduled delivery feature in the future.

payment.a1: We accept credit cards, Mada, Apple Pay, and cash on delivery in some areas.
payment.a2: Yes, we use the latest encryption technologies and secure payment systems to protect your financial information.
payment.q3: How can I get an invoice?
payment.a3: An invoice is automatically sent to your email after completing your order. You can also find all invoices in the 'My Orders' section.
payment.a4: We offer a full refund if an order is canceled before preparation begins. In other cases, refunds are evaluated on a case-by-case basis.
payment.q5: Is there a minimum order amount?
payment.a5: The minimum order amount varies by store. You can check the minimum order before completing your purchase.

account.q1: How can I create an account?
account.a1: You can create an account easily by entering your phone number and verifying it, then completing your personal details.
account.q2: How can I update my account information?
account.a2: You can edit your account details by going to 'Settings' and then 'Edit Profile'.
account.q3: What if I forget my password?
account.a3: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, and we will send you a link to reset your password.
account.q4: How can I add a new address?
account.a4: Go to 'My Addresses' in the settings menu, then click 'Add New Address' and follow the steps.
account.a5: Yes, you can request account deletion by contacting customer service. All your data will be permanently deleted.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.

agreement.title: Your Agreement to the Terms
agreement.description: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you have any questions, please contact us.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Manfaz. These terms and conditions govern your use of our platform and services. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms.

user_agreement.title: User Agreement
user_agreement.content: This agreement defines the relationship between you and Manfaz and outlines your rights and responsibilities as a user.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. If you represent a company, you must be authorized to act on its behalf.

account.title: Account
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You must use the service legally and ethically, without violating others' rights or applicable laws.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.content: We collect certain information to provide our services and improve your experience.

data_usage.title: Data Usage
data_usage.content: We use your data to deliver and enhance our services in accordance with our privacy policy.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content: We take appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: We offer multiple secure payment methods to facilitate your transactions.

methods.title: Payment Methods
methods.content: We accept credit cards, Mada, and other electronic payment methods.

fees.title: Fees
fees.content: Service or delivery fees may apply. You will be informed of all charges before completing your order.

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.content: We apply a fair refund policy based on...

content.title: Prohibited Content
content.content: It is prohibited to publish any illegal or harmful content.

activities.title: Prohibited Activities
activities.content: It is prohibited to engage in any activity that harms the platform or other users.

consequences.title: Consequences
consequences.content: Violating these terms may result in account suspension or termination.

liability.title: Legal Liability
liability.content: We clarify our legal liability and disclaimers for certain cases.

limitations.title: Liability Limitations
limitations.content: We do not assume liability for indirect or consequential damages.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: We agree to indemnify you for any claims arising from your violation of these terms.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: We provide the service 'as is' without any express or implied warranties.

encryption.description: We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your data

access.description: We use a strict access control system to protect your data

monitoring.description: We monitor our systems continuously to ensure security
